Keyboard shortcuts for Discord

A visual cheat-sheet for the 28 keyboard shortcuts found in Discord

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Navigate between servers

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • Up/Down

Navigate between channels

  • Alt
  • Up/Down

Navigate between unread channels

  • Alt
  • Shift
  • Up/Down

Navigate between unread channels with mentions

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Alt
  • Up/Down

Mark channel as read

  • Esc

Mark server read

  • Shift
  • Esc

Toggle hotkeys

  • Ctrl
  • /

Return to previous text channel

  • Ctrl
  • B

Return to active audio channel

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • A

Toggle pins popout

  • Ctrl
  • P

Toggle mentions popout

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • 2

Toggle channel member list

  • Ctrl
  • U

Toggle emoji picker

  • Ctrl
  • E

Scroll chat up or down

  • PgUp/PgDn

Jump to oldest unread message

  • Shift
  • PgUp

Create or join a server

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • N

Answer incoming call

  • Ctrl
  • Enter

Find or start a direct message

  • Ctrl
  • K

Decline incoming call

  • Esc

Create a private group

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • T

Start call in private message or group

  • Ctrl
  • [

Focus text area

  • Tab

Return to connected audio channel

  • Alt
  • Left

Return to previous text channel

  • Alt
  • Right

Toggle mute

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • M

Toggle deafen

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • D

Get help

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • H

Upload a file

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • U
